appId.description: The unique identifier of the application associated with the email event.

appName.description: The name of the application associated with the email event.

bcc.description: The blind carbon copy recipients of the email.

cc.description: The carbon copy recipients of the email.

attempt.description: The number of attempts made to send the email.

browser.description: Details about the email event recipient's browser.

family.description: The family of the browser used by the recipient.

producerUrl.description: The URL of the producer's website.

version.description: The version of the browser used by the recipient.

category.description: The category of the email event.

causedBy.description: Information about the action that caused the email event.

created.description: The timestamp of when the event was created.

id.description: The unique identifier of the event causing this event.

created.description: The timestamp of when the email event was created.

deviceType.description: The type of device used by the recipient.

dropMessage.description: The message associated with dropped email.

dropReason.description: The reason for dropping the email.

duration.description: The duration of the email event.

emailCampaignId.description: The ID of the email campaign associated with the event.

emailCampaignGroupId.description: The group ID of the email campaign associated with the event.

filteredEvent.description: Indicates if the event is filtered.

id.description: The unique identifier of the email event.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the recipient.

linkId.description: The ID of the link in the email.

location.description: Details about the geographical location associated with the email event.

city.description: The city of the recipient's location.

country.description: The country of the recipient's location.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the recipient's location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the recipient's location.

state.description: The state of the recipient's location.

zipcode.description: The zipcode of the recipient's location.

obsoletedBy.description: Information about any email event that this event has made obsolete.

created.description: The timestamp of when the event was obsoleted.

id.description: The ID of the event that obsoleted this event.

portalId.description: The ID of the HubSpot portal.

portalSubscriptionStatus.description: The subscription status of the portal.

referer.description: The referer URL of the email.

replyTo.description: The email address to which replies should be directed.

items.description: The email address for replying to the email.

requestedBy.description: The entity that requested the email event.

requestedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who requested the email event.

response.description: The response code related to the email event.

sentBy.description: Details about the entity that sent the email event.

created.description: The timestamp of when the email was sent.

id.description: The ID of the sender of the email.

smtpId.description: The SMTP ID associated with email event.

source.description: The source of the email event.

sourceId.description: The unique identifier of the email event source.

subscriptions.description: Information about the subscriptions associated with the email event.

legalBasisChange.description: Information about any changes in legal basis related to the subscription.

legalBasisType.description: The type of legal basis for subscription change.

status.description: The status of the email event.

url.description: The URL associated with the email event.

userAgent.description: The user agent of the recipient.
